description:
I denne gratis app fra tvSyd får du de seneste regionale nyheder fra Syd- og Sønderjylland. Hver dag vil appen byde på masser af journalistisk kvalitetsindhold i form af tekst, billeder video og grafik fra alle dele af tvSyds område.
 
tvSyd er en app, som du kan tilpasse til dit behov, og du kan slå notifikationer til, så du med det samme får besked om de vigtigste nyheder fra landsdelen.
 
tvSyd er en af otte selvstændige TV 2-regioner, der leverer public service-indhold til danskerne. Vi dækker følgende kommuner: Aabenraa, Billund, Esbjerg, Fanø, Fredericia, Haderslev, Hedensted, Horsens, Kolding, Sønderborg, Tønder, Varde, Vejen, Vejle og Sydslesvig

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.
* 400 ebooks to choose from, featuring chat fiction and other immersive elements
* Exclusive online novels from best-selling authors
* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.
* Watch your favorite characters' conversation unfold in text messages too!
* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS
* Read or Listen? Whatever your mood and the situation calls for.
* Enjoy stories anywhere, any time.

BOOK CLUB
* Join the discussion online with our vibrant Book Club community
* Join our Facebook group: https://bit.ly/3j9af5g
* Follow us on Instagram: @galatea.stories

DARK MODE / NIGHT READING
* Turn on the Dark Mode for cozy night reading

HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT WRITERS
* Support Galatea writers by purchasing chapters.
* For unlimited access to all of our stories, we have subscription packages!

LANGUAGES
* English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese… more on the way.

The immersive reading app Galatea was developed by Inkitt (Free Novels Inc.)
By using Galatea, you agree to our Terms of Use and Community Guidelines (https://getgalatea.com/terms/) and to our Privacy Policy (https://getgalatea.com/privacy)

Med Ingeniøren i lommen er du sikker på at få kritisk, fair og dybdegående journalistik om den teknologi, som hele tiden rykker grænser og påvirker den verden, vi lever i. 

På Ingeniøren afdækker vi og sætter teknologi i perspektiv - Hvad er fremtiden eksempelvis for vores natur og grøn energi? Hvordan påvirker ny teknologi verdens krigszoner? Hvad betyder det for dig og mig, hvis verdens ledere investerer i atomkraft? 

Med Danmarks største teknologimedie får du både artikler, podcasts, debat og video med afsæt i teknologi, dér hvor den møder dig og dit liv. 

Tak for, at du læser med. 

I Ingeniørens app kan du: 

- Få dagens overblik over de vigtigste teknologinyheder
- Lytte til “Ingeniøren i dag” med udvalgte artikler, mens du laver noget andet
- Høre Ingeniørens podcasts - blandt andet Radar og Transformator
- Se videoformatet Ingeniøren Update, hvor vi har eksperter i studiet
- Søge i alt indhold
- Få oplæst alle artikler
- Deltage i debatten
- Se jobannoncer udvalgt til dig

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

BY DOWNLOADING THE NEW YORK TIMES APP, you agree to:
• The automatic renewal terms stated above.
• The New York Times Privacy Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/privacy-policy
• The New York Times Cookie Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/cookie-policy
• The New York Times California Privacy Notices: http://www.nytimes.com/privacy/california-notice
• The New York Times Terms of Service: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/terms/terms-of-service.html

* Promotional offers for new subscribers only. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply.

Med appen TV 2 Østjylland får du nyheder og historier direkte på din telefon eller tablet. Vi dækker Aarhus, Favrskov, Horsens, Norddjurs, Odder, Randers, Samsø, Silkeborg, Skanderborg, Syddjurs - og alt det der vedrører os der bor i Østjylland.

I appen kan du blandt andet få nyheder, se videoer og lytte til podcasts.

Jyllands-Postens e-avis er den digitale udgave af avisen, som du kender den – en 1:1-udgave af dagens avis og endda med flere fordele: Dagens udgave er tilgængelig allerede fra kl. 21.00 dansk tid aftenen før udgivelsesdato og kan læses på din mobil eller tablet, uanset hvor i verden du befinder dig.

Har du allerede et abonnement på Jyllands-Posten, hvori e-avisen indgår, kan den tilgås alle dage eller på udvalgte dage. Hvilke dage du har adgang, fremgår af din ordrebekræftelse. Har du spørgsmål til din adgang, kan du kontakte vores kundecenter på 8738 3737.

Hvorfor e-avisen? E-avisen er det tidligste eksemplar af Morgenavisen Jyllands-Posten, du kan få. Vi er klar med en ny udgave allerede kl. 21.00 aftenen før udgivelsesdato, og vi fortsætter med at opdatere e-avisen, lige indtil den sidste udgave har forladt redaktionen. Aktivér push-beskeder i appen, og få besked, når dagens udgave er tilgængelig.

E-avisen er aldrig længere væk end din mobil eller tablet og er derfor altid lige ved hånden, når du har brug for den.

E-avisens arkivfunktion giver dig mulighed for at få et historisk tilbageblik, da du let kan navigere rundt i indhold publiceret i Jyllands-Posten helt tilbage til 1871.

Med e-avisens sektionsoverblik får du let og intuitiv adgang til dit favoritindhold. Derudover kan du altid søge efter artikler, skribenter, navne, begivenheder med videre i e-avisens søgefunktion.

Pris: Løssalg (køb af én udgave af e-avisen ): DKK 29,00. Adgang i 30 dage: DKK 299,00 

Betaling: Ved bekræftelse af køb hæves beløbet via din konto i App Store. Du opkræves for en ny periode 24 timer før indeværende periode på 30 dage er slut. Når dine 30 dages adgang udløber, fornyes den automatisk. Du kan til enhver tid stoppe den automatiske fornyelse via indstillingerne på din mobil eller tablet senest 24 timer før begyndelsen af næste betalingsperiode. 

Når du har købt dit abonnement via appen: Dit abonnement og autofornyelse kan administreres under konto-indstillinger i App Store efter køb.

Anvendelsesvilkår (Terms of Use): https://abonnement.jyllands-posten.dk/abonnementsvilkaar/

Read 7,000+ of the world’s most popular newspapers and magazines on your iPhone or iPad. Enjoy unlimited reading on up to 3 devices with a 7-day free trial of PressReader Premium. 
 
PressReader is the best way to read your favourite magazines and newspapers in one place—from local stories to global news, and everything in between. Download complete issues and switch between the original print view and a mobile-optimized text view. Bring it all to life with Auto-Translate to over 30 languages or listen to stories with our text-to-speech features.  
 
Subscribe to PressReader Premium to get unlimited access to most publications in the catalog or purchase single issues of your favorite title. Individual subscriptions for some publications are also available. To access PressReader without a subscription, visit one of our HotSpot partners.

Wype leverer viden og underholdning digitalt i høj kvalitet, og dækker interesser inden for mange forskellige emner, som fx historie, videnskab, sundhed, træning, fotografering, gør-det-selv arbejde, mad og mode. Der er helt sikkert indhold til både dig og din familie.

* Illustreret Videnskab
* Historie
* Alt om Historie
* Bo Bedre
* COSTUME
* COSTUME Living
* I FORM
* Aktiv Træning
* Bil Magasinet
* Gør Det Selv
* Komputer For Alle
* Digital Foto
* Bolig Magasinet

* Nordic Living

Kvalitets læseoplevelse

Wype har funktioner, som gør det nemmere og mere behageligt at læse magasiner og artikler på dine forskellige devices - både derhjemme og på farten. Én af de funktioner der sikrer en god læseoplevelse på smartphone er mobilartikler, hvor du kan læse artikler som ren tekst i stedet for at læse artiklen i magasinet. Her kan du blandt andet styre tekststørrelsen efter dit behov.

Del med familien

Wype kan bruges på op til 5 enheder, så hele familien kan deles om godt indhold.

Download og læs når du er offline

Download magasiner når du har internetforbindelse, så kan du altid læse dine yndlings magasiner og artikler, når du er offline i udlandet eller på flyet.

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!
Nyhedsapp, der giver dig de vigtigste lokale nyheder fra Fyn. Læs nyheder, følg de lokale sportshold på JFM Play, hør spændende podcasts og fordyb dig i e-avisen.

HVORFOR PLING?
•	Få adgang til over 1.000 magasiner og ugeblade så snart de udkommer
•	Lav et personligt bibliotek med alle dine favorit-magasiner og blade
•	Del med op til 5 venner eller familiemedlemmer samtidig
•	Læs både online og offline i en nem læse-app
•	Prøv første måned gratis

HAR PLING DIT FAVORIT MAGASIN ELLER BLAD? 
Det kan vi næsten garantere dig! I Pling har du adgang til over 1.000 danske og internationale magasiner og blade, så dine favoritter er sikkert i blandt.  Se nogle af de mange magasiner og blade du kan læse i Pling længere nede. Er du tvivl, om dit magasin eller blad findes i Pling, kan du prøve en gratis måned helt uden binding lige nu!

LAV ET PERSONLIGT BIBLIOTEK & UDFORSK OVER 1000 MAGASINER OG UGEBLADE
Når du har fundet de blade og magasiner, som du elsker at læse, kan du nemt gemme dem i dit personlige bibliotek. Derefter kan du gå på opdagelse i de over 1.000 danske og internationale magasiner og blade, du har adgang til i Pling.

NEM DIGITAL LÆSE-APP
Vi har samlet alle de bedste magasiner og blade og gjort det nemt at læse dem alle i én læse-app. Pling er en god læse-app, gør det nemt for dig at læse dine magasiner og blade, uanet om du er på farten eller nyder en afslappende stund. 

LÆS BÅDE ONLINE OG OFFLINE
Plings digitale læse-app giver dig mulighed for at læse magasiner og blade både online og offline. Du kan nemt downloade magasiner og blade, så de kan læses offline i flyet, på ferien eller i sommerhuset. 

DEL DIT ABONNEMENT MED VENNER OG FAMILIE
Dit abonnement på Pling, kan deles med op til 5 venner eller familiemedlemmer. I kan endda læse hvert jeres magasin eller blad samtidig!

PRØV FØRSTE MÅNED GRATIS
Prøv Pling gratis i én måned og se, hvor meget den digitale læse-app har at tilbyde. Download Pling i dag og start din gratis prøveperiode, uden binding.

DANSKE MAGASINER OG BLADE
I Pling kan du læse om alt fra nyheder om sport og kendte til trends inden for bolig og design eller få inspiration til lækre opskrifter på mad. Kun i Pling finder du Allers magasiner og blade digitalt. Du finder blandt andet:
• BILLED-BLADET
• SE og HØR
• femina
• SØNDAG
• Familie Journal
• Ude og Hjemme
• SPIS BEDRE
• ISABELLAS
• ELLE

FÅ MAGASINER OG BLADE FRA HELE VERDEN
Når vi siger, at Pling er har Danmarks største udvalg af digitale magasiner, indebærer det ikke kun danske magasiner men også udenlandske magasiner og ugeblade. Vil du følge med i nyheder, sport eller mode i USA, Frankrig, Spanien eller noget fjerde, har Pling magasiner og blade fra hele verden. Læs populære magasiner og blade fra udlandet som:
• HELLO! Magazine
• VOGUE
• Cosmopolitan
• New York Magazine
• Time Magazine
• BBC Good Food Magazine

PRISER OG ABONNEMENT
Tegn et abonnement på Pling og få adgang til et hav af magasiner og ugeblade. Du kan også købe magasiner enkeltvist, når det passer dig. 
Disse abonnementstyper kan du få i Pling:
• Pling på abonnement: tegner du et abonnement, får du første måned gratis. Derefter koster Pling 99 kr. om måneden. Abonnementet fortsætter som løbende abonnement, der automatisk fornys. Pengene bliver trukket via dit Apple ID.
• Enkeltsalg i Pling: magasiner og ugeblade fra Aller kan købes enkeltvist i Pling. Pengene bliver trukket via dit Apple ID.

BETINGELSER OG OPSIGELSE
Der er ingen binding på Pling, og du kan altid opsige dit abonnement. Hvis du vil opsige dit abonnement, skal du deaktivere det via Apple App Store eller via ’Indstillinger’ på din iPhone. Dette skal du gøre senest 24 timer inden en ny betalingsperiode starter. 
Læs mere om, hvordan du stopper dit abonnement her: https://support.apple.com/da-dk/HT202039
Læs øvrige betingelser her: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dk/terms.html
Privatlivspolitik: http://derforcookies.aller.dk
Handelsbetingelser: https://pling.dk/handelsbetingelser/

KONTAKT PLING
Vi hører gerne fra dig. Besøg os www.pling.dk, skriv til os pling@aller.com eller ring +45 72 34 20 81.

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Presse-fotos.dk holder dig opdateret med historier fra både ind- og udland. Ønsker du at få besked om de vigtigste begivenheder, kan du tilmelde dig push-notifikationer, og tilpasse disse så du udelukkende opdateres på de emner/begivenheder du finder relevant. 

OM PRESSE-FOTOS.DK
Presse-fotos.dk er stiftet i 2013, og har siden starten været ejet og drevet af Mathias Øgendal. Mathias, der er medlem af Danmarks Journalistforbund og Danske medier, har en mangeårig historik med fotografering, og har siden starten af 00´erne leveret nyhedsbilleder til diverse lokale, nationale og internationale medier. Fokus har fra dag ét været på 112-genren. I dag har Presse-fotos.dk vokset sig stort, og det er ikke længere kun Mathias, der leverer billeder og video for Presse-fotos.dk. 

"Nyhedsfotografering er en livsstil og kræver at “man er på” 24/7/365 – og det er vi hos Presse-fotos.dk. Vores fotografer leverer daglige nyheder til vores mere end 100.000 faste følgere på Facebook og formidler  ugentlig masser af billeder og videosekvenser til danske og udenlandske medier."

Presse-fotos.dk har siden 2013 tilpasset leverings-paletten fra alene at tilbyde still-fotos, til i dag også at producere video, voxpops, droneoptagelser mm. Alt leveret i egen produktion og af vores egne faste fotografer/journalister.

Get all your news in one place on an eye-opening platform that shows you the bias, reliability and ownership of every source you read. Cut through the noise and escape media echo chambers with Ground News.

Ground News is the largest news aggregator in the world with over 50K news sources and 60K articles added daily. But we aren’t a typical news aggregator, throwing hundreds of headlines at you that barely skim the surface. Ground frees people from algorithmic restraints, illuminates blindspots and makes media bias explicit with our one-of-a-kind media analysis features.

AVOID MANIPULATIVE ALGORITHMS
SPOT MEDIA  BIAS
DISCOVER BLINDSPOTS
CHECK THE RELIABILITY OF SOURCES
SEE WHO OWNS THE NEWS YOU CONSUME

Read daily breaking stories from sources around the world, in real time. Like a modern day newspaper, we show you diverse stories instead of algorithm-driven content that can limit your worldview. News coverage is rarely unbiased, so we give you as much context as possible so you can come to your own conclusions. Compare coverage on partisan topics like politics, and elections.

Enjoy our free features, or subscribe for in-depth analysis that will transform the way you look at news.


About Your Ground News Subscription: 
Subscriptions renew monthly and can be managed through your App Store account
Payment will be charged to your App Store Account on confirmation of purchase
Renewal is automatic unless turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
Subscriptions can also be managed through Ground News by going to your Account Settings after purchase 

See full terms and conditions here: https://ground.news/terms-and-conditions

Læs Danmarks Naturfredningsforenings medlemsmagasin.

Magasinet giver dig inspirerende og håbefulde historier om klima, natur og miljø.
Vi fortæller historier om tidens tendenser og inspirerer til en grønnere verden.

Vi fortæller om mennesker, der gør en forskel for natur og klima, du kan læse fascinerende historier om vores dyr og planter, blive guidet til at komme ud i naturen og finde lækre opskrifter.
Nyhedsapp, der giver dig de vigtigste lokale nyheder fra Ringkøbing-Skjern. Læs nyheder, følg de lokale sportshold på JFM Play, hør spændende podcasts og fordyb dig i e-avisen.

Newspapers UK - Get the latest UK news directly on your phone!

Newspapers UK is your ultimate source for the most relevant and up-to-date news from all over the UK. Stay informed about the latest events, political developments, sports, culture, and much more, all in one place.

The UK's largest collection of news outlets. News is a lightning-fast web browser where you can quickly and easily bookmark links to the websites you want.

Features: Read Later Function: Save interesting articles for later reading when you have more time available. You can easily save and organize your favorites, so you can always come back to them.

Newspapers UK includes its own LITE Web Browser, optimized for most news sites to provide the best experience and, as a result, the UK's best news app.

If the built-in web browser doesn't meet your expectations, you can always choose an external web browser and read your favorite newspapers there.

Many links are readily available by default. If these links are not sufficient, you can, of course, add all your own private links as well.

Comprehensive News Coverage: Access a wide range of UK news from various reliable sources and media outlets. Select your favorite categories and stay updated within your areas of interest.

Stay up to date with the most important events in the UK with the UK News app.

Download it now and get easy and quick access to the latest UK news!

developer: Dow Jones & Company, Inc., publisher of The Wall Street Journal.
description:
WALL STREET JOURNAL (iOS) 

Download the WSJ App Today

Staying ahead of the competition means staying up to date with the facts. Get the trusted insights, in-depth analysis and real-time updates you need from the WSJ App.

Download the app today and subscribe to receive instant access to WSJ’s unrivaled journalism covering today’s top stories across finance, politics, business, tech, the economy and more. Enjoy exclusive newsletters and videos that dive deeper into the stories that matter.

The WSJ App provides comprehensive access that will help you better understand and navigate the complexities of today’s financial world. Regardless of your investing experience, download the app to make more sound financial decisions.

Your subscription will renew automatically each month and payment will be charged to your iTunes Account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Inkitt Brings Stories to Life

Join Inkitt for the Community 
Dive into Inkitt, where stories, books, and novels come to life in a global community of readers and writers. Our readers are the trendsetters. Every day, millions of readers come to Inkitt to discover the next bestseller. Get feedback on your work, share your favorite science fiction or adventure stories, and explore a treasure trove of fantasy and romance novels. 

Unlimited Reading, A Library of Indie Novels Awaits
Enjoy unlimited reading across genres you love. From steamy romance to thrilling adventure, or captivating fantasy to provocative romance, there’s something for everyone:
Discover indie novels from promising writers
Explore a new niche like mafia romances, fantasy adventures, or your favorite fanfiction
Download books to read offline anytime
Personalize your experience with customizable fonts and colors
Autoscroll while immersed in your favorite stories

Become the Next Blockbuster 
Inkitt is the world’s first reader-powered publisher, connecting readers with new books, captivating novels, and extraordinary stories. Our platform is home to romance, adventure, and fantasy gems waiting to be discovered. Indie authors who shine can gain opportunities for publication or adaptations, making their books accessible to fans worldwide.

Get fearless, independent journalism with the Guardian app. Never miss breaking news, dive into diverse opinion pieces, and follow stories minute-by-minute with our dynamic live blogs - from world news and politics to business and sport. Get the following app exclusive features:

My Guardian - Your own custom feed of your favourite topics and writers, so you can follow the stories you care most about. 

Puzzles - Whether you're looking for classics like Soduku and Crosswords, or fun word games like Wordiply and Word wheel, we have the puzzle for you. 

Podcasts - Listen to our award-winning podcasts directly in the Guardian app. 
 
Listen to Articles - Can't read our articles? Listen to them instead. You can get realistic audio transcription of every article we publish - excluding live blogs. 

The Guardian news app is free to download and offers you a beautiful, intuitive mobile experience – so you can read, watch and listen to our independent reporting whenever and wherever it suits you. Readers have a limited number of articles, which refreshes on a regular basis. If you’re a regular reader, you might consider subscribing. Subscribing gives you full access to Guardian articles in our app, so you can read quality, international journalism with no restrictions.

And, when you subscribe, you’ll unlock:

Unlimited reading in the app, with no subscription messages
Ad-free reading, for an uninterrupted experience
Offline reading – download articles to explore on the go

What’s more, subscribing to our news app is a great way to show your support for fearless, independent Guardian journalism. As a reader-funded news organisation, we rely on your funding to power our future. Thank you.

All content in the Guardian app is copyright Guardian News & Media 2025. All rights reserved.

Our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy apply when accessing content via the Guardian app.

Privacy Policy: http://www.theguardian.com/help/privacy-policy

Terms of Service: http://www.theguardian.com/help/terms-of-service

If you subscribe to the Guardian app, our subscription terms will also apply https://www.theguardian.com/info/2023/feb/24/the-guardian-news-app-terms-conditions. Your subscription will auto renew and you will be charged before the next renewal date unless you cancel.
